sentences.en: 'Now , I'll put you in a corner,'forensically shaking a forefinger at him.
sentences.cn: “ 我不会给你退路的.”他像在法庭上一样向他晃着一根指头.

sentences.en: Frannie shushed her with a forefinger to the lips.
sentences.cn: 弗兰妮把食指放在嘴唇上让她安静。

sentences.en: Grasp chart with thump and forefinger and pull straight up.
sentences.cn: 用拇指和食指紧握原表,在垂直向上拉.

sentences.en: He held it between the tips of his thumb and forefinger.
sentences.cn: 他用他大拇指和食指尖拿着它.

sentences.en: He pinched the leaf between his thumb and forefinger.
sentences.cn: 他将叶子捏在拇指和食指之间.

sentences.en: He raised his forefinger indicatively, as parents do to children.
sentences.cn: 像父母对小孩说话一样,他暗示地伸出了食指.

sentences.en: He seized one of Winston's remaining front teeth between his powerful thumb and forefinger.
sentences.cn: 他用大拇指和食指有力地板住温斯顿剩下的一颗门牙.

sentences.en: He took the pen between his thumb and forefinger.
sentences.cn: 他用拇指和食指捏着笔。

sentences.en: His forefinger darted in all directions as he spoke.
sentences.cn: 当他讲话时食指飞掷各个方向.

sentences.en: His forefinger was cut by knife and bled a lot.
sentences.cn: 他的示指被刀划破了,流了很多血.

sentences.en: I can make my thumb and forefinger meet round your bicep.
sentences.cn: 你的胳膊还不如我的大拇指和食指合拢来的圈儿那么粗.

sentences.en: I held a sharp blue edge of steel tightly between thumb and forefinger to each fist.
sentences.cn: 我每只手的拇指和食指之间都紧紧地捏着一片锋利的蓝钢刀片.

sentences.en: The little child took her ear between his thumb and forefinger and tugged it playfully.
sentences.cn: 小孩用大拇指和食指捏住她的耳朵,拉着玩.

sentences.en: Warren Trent's forefinger stabbed the document between them on the bar.
sentences.cn: 沃伦·特伦特的食指指着酒柜上放在他们之间的那份报告.

sentences.en: You distance all rivals, and may soon touch the sky with your forefinger.
sentences.cn: 你把一切敌手都远远抛在后面, 不久就能用你的食指触着天了.
